content.text:
The deployment script has been executed. It successfully:
- Extracted the update archive (with some tar warnings about extended headers)
- Stopped the PM2 application
- Started the deployment process

There was a warning about `/var/www/moonyetis/` not being a directory, but the deployment continued and the application is now stopped and ready for the new version to be deployed.

message.content:
# Verificar que los archivos se extrajeron correctamente
  ls -la /tmp/moonyetis-backend/

  # Crear el directorio de destino si no existe
  sudo mkdir -p /var/www/moonyetis

  # Copiar los archivos de la nueva versión
  sudo cp -r /tmp/moonyetis-backend/* /var/www/moonyetis/

  # Configurar permisos correctos
  sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/moonyetis
  sudo chmod -R 755 /var/www/moonyetis

  # Verificar que el archivo principal existe
  ls -la /var/www/moonyetis/frontend/index.html

  # Instalar dependencias
  cd /var/www/moonyetis && npm install --production

  # Reiniciar el servicio
  pm2 start moonyetis-production
  pm2 status
